attributes.action: send the Foreign Secretary and a high-level Ministerial delegation to Cuba
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We agree with EDM 1171: We "welcome the fresh approach to international relations with Cuba including recent legislation in the US to lift family visiting restrictions on Cuban-Americans; [we] note the recent formal visits to Cuba by the Irish and Spanish Foreign Ministers and Presidents of Chile and Argentina; [we] further note the recent visit by the Shadow Foreign Secretary to Cuba; [we] welcome the fact that the UK enjoys excellent relations with Cuba in the fields of sport, biotechnology and the arts; and call on the Government to send a high level Ministerial delegation to Cuba, led by the Foreign Secretary, to build on UK-Cuba relations and UK interests in the region."
